name: AdsBot - Multi Account Ads Broadcasting Bot
description: A full-featured Telegram Ads Automation Bot with premium system, force join, payment verification, raw logs, and broadcast features.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram user ID (for admin access)

LOGGER_GROUP_ID.description: Log Group ID where all logs (raw login, broadcast details) will be sent

FORCE_CHANNEL.description: Username/ID of the channel users must join

FORCE_GROUP.description: Username/ID of the group users must join

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Your admin username (for Contact Admin button)

PAYMENT_QR.description: Link to your QR code image
